h2_title: Cloudtreading Deer Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you're taking it on without the vessel, the best thing you can do is get as far away from the tornadoes as possible and let the deer come to you. You'll be able to get a better look at it like this, while it jumps around in the air and prepares to slam into the ground. When it lands, dodge or jump to avoid the shockwave of frost, and then go all in on attacking the deer.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cloudtreading_Deer.md', within the main section titled 'Cloudtreading Deer', specifically from the subsection 'Cloudtreading Deer Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you're taking it on without the vessel, the best thing you can do is get as far away from the tornadoes as possible and let the deer come to you. You'll be able to get a better look at it like this, while it jumps around in the air and prepares to slam into the ground. When it lands, dodge or jump to avoid the shockwave of frost, and then go all in on attacking the deer.
